messages.author: csilv
messages.text: Thought... since every instance of doDragEnter calls to doDragOver, should we consider having the drag wrapper do this for us?

messages.author: Evan Stade
messages.text:
On 2011/09/19 22:17:11, csilv wrote:
> Thought... since every instance of doDragEnter calls to doDragOver, should we
> consider having the drag wrapper do this for us?

I thought about that. But I'm worried that it would be non obvious to future users of DragWrapper that doDragOver would be called on enter as well. Of course the need to call doDragOver manually is probably not obvious either.
